text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem school-codes

This case-sensitive code system http://va.gov/fhir/vco/CodeSystem/school-codes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
school School or training
school-status School Status
in-school In school or another type of training program
not-in-school-interested Not in school or completing training currently, but interested in obtaining additional education or training
not-in-school-not-interested Not in school or completing training currently, and not interested in obtaining additional education or training
school-performance School performance
school-satisfaction School satisfaction

name: SchoolCodes
title: School Codes
description: School or training related codes, mapping to standard terminologies is TBD.

concept.display: In school or another type of training program
Not in school or completing training currently, but interested in obtaining additional education or training
Not in school or completing training currently, and not interested in obtaining additional education or training
